mapper.insert: insert into collaboration_company (only_status, company_images, describe, avtive_time, end_time, is_active, business_people,link_url) values (#{onlyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyImages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avtiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT}, #{businessPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{linkUrl})
mapper.update: update collaboration_company set only_status = #{onlyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_images = #{companyImages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avtive_time = #{avtiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT}, business_people = #{businessPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, only_status, company_images, describe, avtive_time, end_time, is_active, business_people, link_url from collaboration_company where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, only_status, company_images, describe, avtive_time, end_time, is_active, business_people ,link_url from collaboration_company
